overview: In this controversial documentary, Award winning Director/Choreographer George Faison has decided to take on the problems of violence, racism, gangs and ill perceptions of all Americans. Directed by Shedrack Anderson,In this telling film he takes on a role of a lifetime by going to be with the people and asking what they really think. be prepared to question your very lifepath after watching the most important film.
title: Through The Cracks
